data.message: check this out .......................it has been more than a year , i spent a million tears .. on you , sitting under a tree with snickers besides me , imagining all things we should have seen , remembering you every time i see emotion movie regardless of how big is the screen , waiting for the end to come with zero strenght to face the storm , sitting here powerless..careless to the fucking world , i aint EMINEM .. wont take mtv's global icon award .... for sure , but the only award i get is my ice-brain in a stick cuz i didn't listen to it when it said (hey hazem i hate racism but this girl is black inside and she have alot to hide.. under that cute face is a different side that you wont like) but i thought she dont bite .. so i designed this rhythm to show that the time most of time can teach you with signs.
